Store.name: M16
Store.desc: The M16 rifle is a gas operated standard infantry assault rifle chambered for 5.56x45mm NATO round.

Store.name: FN FiveSeven
Store.desc: The FN Five Seven is a standard issue handgun that was designed to fire a 5.7 mm round. It is an effective weapon against close range targets.

Store.name: G36
Store.desc: The MTAC X36 assault rifle fires a 5.56 mm round. Its high rate of fire and medium recoil deliver a reasonably tight spread on impact of targets up to medium ranges.

Store.name: AK-74M
Store.desc: The AK-74M assault rifle is an upgrade of the AK 74 design with a slightly increased rate of fire. It fires a 5.45 x 39 mm round accurately at medium ranges.

Store.name: AKM
Store.desc: The AKM is an assault rifle that was designed as a simplified version of the AK-47 rifle. It fires a 7.62 x 39 mm round and is relatively effective at medium ranges.

Store.name: AKS-74U
Store.desc: The AKS-74U is a shortened gas operated carbine version of the AKS-74 assault rifle. It fires a 5.45 x 39 mm round and is very effective at medium ranges.

Store.name: M4 Semi
Store.desc: The civilian M4 semi auto rifle chambered for 5.56x45mm NATO round.

Store.name: M4
Store.desc: The M4 is a versitile light weight commando style assault rifle that is gas operated and fires a 5.56 x 45 mm round effectively in both close and medium ranges.

Store.name: PKM
Store.desc: The PKM machine gun was designed to fire a 7.62 mm rounds from a linked system and is reasonably accurate out to medium ranged targets.

Store.name: MP7
Store.desc: The RA TR7 submachine gun is a special issue weapon that fires a 4.6 mm standard cartridge from a 30 round magazine. It is effective at close range targets.

Store.name: UZI
Store.desc: The special issue UZI submachine gun is a open bolt blow back design that fires 9 mm rounds from its magazine housed in the weapons pistol grip.

Store.name: SVD
Store.desc: The SVD sniper rifle was designed to fire a 7.62 mm round from a 10 round clip. Combined with an Optical Sniper Scope it is extremely accurate.

Store.name: VSS VINTOREZ
Store.desc: The VSS Vintorez sniper rifle was designed to fire a 9 x 39 mm round using a gas operated rotating bolt firing system. It is designed to be effective at medium distances.

Store.name: MAUSER SP66
Store.desc: The Mauser SP66 sniper rifle was designed to fire a .308W round from a 5 round clip. It is highly accurate at long ranges when combined with a good scope.

Store.name: AW Magnum
Store.desc: The AWM sniper rifle fires a custom .338W magnum round with devastating accuracy and effect. Each of its rounds deal a very high amount of damage.

Store.name: M107
Store.desc: The M107 sniper rifle fires a .50 caliber round that strikes with deadly effect at extreme ranges. It has a 10 round clip that allows for a high rate of fire.

Store.name: RPK-74
Store.desc: The RPK-74 machine gun fires a 5.45 mm high velocity round that delivers a reasonably accurate rate of fire onto targets out to medium ranges.

Store.name: FN M249
Store.desc: The FN M249 machine gun fires a 5.56 mm round from a belt fed system. It is highly effective against targets at close and medium ranges.

Store.name: SAIGA
Store.desc: The Saiga was developed as a 12 gauge shotgun with a 8 round storage tube. It inflicts a substancial amount of damage on targets at a close range.

Store.name: MP5/10
Store.desc: The MP5/10 submachine gun was designed to fire a 10 mm Auto rounds from a 30 round clip effectively against close ranged targets.

Store.name: Honey Badger
Store.desc: The Honey Badger submachine gun fires a .300 round at a medium rate of fire causing a good amount of damage on close range targets.

Store.name: FN P90
Store.desc: The FN P90 submachine gun was designed to fire 9 mm rounds from a large 50 round magazine. It is very effective on close range targets.

Store.name: EVO-3
Store.desc: The EVO-3 submachine gun was designed to effectively fire 9 mm rounds from a 25 round magazine at close ranged targets at a very high rate of fire..

Store.name: BIZON
Store.desc: The Bizon submachine gun was designed to fire a 9 mm round from a 64 round magazine delivering accurate fire on close range targets.

Store.name: B92
Store.desc: The B92 handgun was specially designed to fire a 9mm round and is reasonably effective agains close range targets.

Store.name: B93R
Store.desc: The B93R handgun was designed to fire a 9mm parabellum round from a 20 round clip. It is a relatively effective weapon against close ranged targets.

Store.name: Jericho 9mm
Store.desc: The Jericho was designed as a universal self-loading pistol which fires a 9mm Parabellum round and is highly effective at close range.

Store.name: MOSSBERG 590
Store.desc: The Mossberg 590 is a 12 gauge shotgun which has a 8 round storage tube. It is known to do an extremely high amount of damage at close range.
